com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan

Class DefaultPlanCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.DefaultObservable
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.ChainedObserver
        • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.DefaultPlanCoordinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable, Observer, PlanCoordinator

    public class DefaultPlanCoordinator
extends ChainedObserver
implements PlanCoordinator
    Default implementation of PlanCoordinator. A DefaultPlanCoordinator is an Observable and will forward updates from its plans.
